components.name: You are my Star.
components.description: Replaces the favorite marker with a star. Just as it was intended.

components.name: I am shy.
components.description: Hides the discover button so you don't need to meet new people.

components.name: Is this the Middle?
components.description: Centers channel banners in the server tree. Just like in the good old days!

components.name: Why a Backgroundâ€½
components.description: Removes the blurry background from images in the chat.

components.name: No more Hexes.
components.description: Removes the hexagon background from all the corners of the client.

components.name: Scale Images.
components.description: Makes images in the chat scale to fit their aspect ratio, so you can finally see them.

components.name: I hate people.
components.description: Hides the user list, so you don't have to see people or their messages.

components.name: Mute and Deaf.
components.description: Hides the bookmarks, so you are not tempted to connect to a server.

components.name: Loneliness.
components.description: Hides the groups, so you are not influenced by the crowds.

components.name: Streamer Privacy.
components.description: Blurs server names and connection info, so you'll be alone with your thoughts.

components.name: What are changes?
components.description: Blurs the changelog, so you don't accidentally leak the alpha changes again...

components.name: Chat Indent.
components.description: Indents chats in the activities to distinguish them from servers.

components.name: Fixed it for you!
components.description: Someone didn't know how to capitalize TeamSpeak correctly, so I fixed it.

components.name: Grayscale.
components.description: Makes the client grayscale, so you can focus on the important things.

components.name: High Contrast.
components.description: Makes the client high contrast, so you can focus on the important things.

components.name: Overlayn't.
components.description: Position the overlay in the bottom left inline, so you can see the things behind.

components.name: Unemotional.
components.description: Removes the reactions from messages, so you won't be bothered with ðŸ¥“ reactions.

components.name: ðŸ¥“ðŸ¥“ðŸ¥“
components.description: Everything is bacon, Everything is cool when you're part of the bacon.

components.name: Let it Snow.
components.description: Adds a snow effect to the client, so you can feel the winter.

components.name: Let it Bacon.
components.description: Adds a bacon effect to the client, so you can feel the bacon.

components.name: Adblock
components.description: Why TeamSpeak... You were supposed to destroy them not join them!
